attributes.action: provide more support to football match officials by making it a criminal offence for TV pundits who, having decided that a decision made by an official was wrong, condone players and managers haranguing those officials.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My local newspaper carries stories of dads physically assaulting referees who make decisions they disagree with in respect of their sons' teams. Fans invade pitches when implored not too (Bradford City - last home game 07/08 season). Rich football stars in the Premier League (Chelsea - a good example) chase referees who make decisions they don't like.  Time for TV pundits to stop condoning inappropriate behaviour and to set a leadership example.
